Name: Torrential Manipulation
Story Background: In the midst of a raging storm, a powerful mage channels the chaotic energy of the tempest, bending it to their will.
Ability: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. You may cast an instant or sorcery spell without paying its mana cost.
Appearance Description: A cloaked figure stands amid crashing waves and swirling clouds, raising their outstretched hand toward a towering cyclone, commanding the elements with an intense focus.
